value.title: Translate speech with the speech service
value.excerpt: Perform speech translation tasks with the speech service to translate spoken text to different languages.

value.title: Tune hyperparameters with Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Choosing optimal hyperparameter values for model training can be difficult, and usually involved a great deal of trial and error. With Azure Machine Learning, you can leverage cloud-scale experiments to tune hyperparameters.

value.title: Use containers for your Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS) Apps
value.excerpt: The Language Understanding (LUIS) container loads your trained or published Language Understanding model. As a LUIS app, the docker container provides access to the query predictions from the container's API endpoints

value.title: How to get started with Azure Machine Learning Service | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, learn how to get started with the Azure Machine Learning Service and how you can use it from Visual Studio Code.   For more tips and tricks, visit: http://azuredev.tips  Get started with 12 months of free services and $200 USD in credit.  Create your free account
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/8EGJP7RPe1A" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Create conversational AI solutions
value.excerpt: Conversational AI revolves around user interactions, in this case through Bots. In this learning path, you will learn how to create chat bots and integrate the bot with various AI services to add intelligence to the interaction. Learn how to integrate the QnA Maker Service (an easy method to add question and answers for bots), and explore the new Virtual Assistant scenarios for creating branded experiences with bots.

topItems.title: Build a chat bot with the Azure portal
topItems.excerpt: Create and test a basic chat bot using the Azure portal

topItems.title: Design a bot conversation flow
topItems.excerpt: Learn the principles of good bot design and implement conversational flows, knowledge bots, and how to hand-off interactions to a human.

topItems.title: Create a Bot with the Bot Framework Composer
topItems.excerpt: User the Bot Framework Composer to quickly and easily build sophisticated conversational bots without writing code.

value.title: Evaluate text with Azure Cognitive Language Services
value.excerpt: Learn how to use Cognitive Language Services to analyze text, determine intent, detect adult themes, and process natural language input

topItems.title: Classify and moderate text with Azure Content Moderator
topItems.excerpt: In this module, we'll introduce you to Azure Content Moderator and show how to use it for text moderation

topItems.title: Add conversational intelligence to your apps by using Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS)
topItems.excerpt: In this module, we'll introduce you to Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS) and show how to build and publish a LUIS model

topItems.title: Discover sentiment in text with the Text Analytics API
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use the Text Analytics API and Azure Functions to discover what your customers are really saying in their feedback about your products or brands.

value.title: Process and Translate Speech with Azure Cognitive Speech Services
value.excerpt: Learn how to implement the Speech services found in Azure Cognitive Services by performing speech-to-text transcription, synthesize text input to speech, perform speech translation, and implement speaker recognition in your AI infused applications

topItems.title: Transcribe speech input to text
topItems.excerpt: Speech to text from the speech service, known as speech recognition, enables real time transcription of audio streams into text. Your applications, tools, or devices can consume, display, and take action on this text as command input.

topItems.title: Synthesize Text Input to Speech
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to synthesize text to speech using the Speech-to-Text service.

topItems.title: Translate speech with the speech service
topItems.excerpt: Perform speech translation tasks with the speech service to translate spoken text to different languages.

value.title: Define an AI strategy to create business value
value.excerpt: Explore the strategic components, use cases, and special factors of an enterprise AI strategy that creates real business value, with INSEAD and Microsoft.

value.title: Understand the importance of building an AI-ready culture
value.excerpt: Understand the key elements that make a culture AI-ready and a framework to drive the change needed in your organization for a successful AI strategy.

value.title: Build a chat bot with the Azure portal
value.excerpt: Create and test a basic chat bot using the Azure portal

value.title: Classify and moderate text with Azure Content Moderator
value.excerpt: In this module, we'll introduce you to Azure Content Moderator and show how to use it for text moderation

value.title: Classify images with the Microsoft Custom Vision Service
value.excerpt: In this learning path, find out how Cognitive Vision Services detects faces, tags and classifies images, and identifies objects.

value.title: Deep learning with Horovod for distributed training
value.excerpt: Deep learning with Horovod for distributed training

value.title: Use deep learning models to make predictions about specialized data
value.excerpt: Use convolutional neural networks and recurrent neural networks to analyze and predict images and text with TensorFlow and Keras.

images.title: Use deep learning models to make predictions about specialized data

value.title: Describe Azure Databricks Delta Lake architecture
value.excerpt: Describe Azure Databricks Delta Lake architecture

value.title: Design a bot conversation flow
value.excerpt: Learn the principles of good bot design and implement conversational flows, knowledge bots, and how to hand-off interactions to a human.

value.title: Detect language with the text analytics API
value.excerpt: Language detection is useful for content stores that collect arbitrary text, where language is unknown. You can parse the results of this analysis to determine which language is used in the input document.

value.title: Extract insights from videos with the Video Indexer service
value.excerpt: Learn how to use the Video Indexer API to upload, index, retrieve insights, and search for content in video files.

value.title: Extract key phrases from text with the text analytics API
value.excerpt: Automatically extract key phrases to quickly identify the main points in documents or text.

value.title: Discover how to foster an AI-ready culture in marketing
value.excerpt: Learn the necessary cultural changes for enterprise marketing organizations to make AI transformation successful, and how they fit into a holistic AI strategy.

value.title: Identify faces and expressions by using the Computer Vision API in Azure Cognitive Services
value.excerpt: Learn how to use the Computer Vision API in Azure to identify facial details in pictures

value.title: Introduction to Mixed Reality
value.excerpt: Mixed Reality is transforming the nature of on-the-job training, game development, and consumer application development. Build a foundation in the core concepts, terminology, and design processes unique to the augmented reality, virtual reality, and Mixed Reality development space. Get familiar with HoloLens, Windows Mixed Reality immersive headsets, bodystorming prototypes, and the most common use-cases for Mixed Reality content.

value.title: Manage your Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS) Apps
value.excerpt: Learn to manage LUIS apps through versioning, key management, handling data, and improving predictions.

value.title: Examine the Microsoft approach to artificial intelligence
value.excerpt: Learn how Microsoft creates products, services, and solutions to help organizations leverage AI. Understand how these technologies relate to business problems.

value.title: Perform model selection with hyperparameter tuning
value.excerpt: Perform model selection with hyperparameter tuning

value.title: Process streaming data with Azure Databricks structured streaming
value.excerpt: Process streaming data with Azure Databricks structured streaming

value.title: Read text with the Computer Vision service
value.excerpt: Optical character recognition (OCR) enables artificial intelligence (AI) systems to read text in images, enabling applications to extract information from photographs, scanned documents, and other sources of digitized text.

value.title: Recognize entities in text with the text analytics API
value.excerpt: Identify and categorize entities in your text as people, places, organizations, date/time, quantities, percentages, currencies, and more.

value.title: Train a machine learning model
value.excerpt: Train a machine learning model

value.excerpt: Speech to text from the speech service, known as speech recognition, enables real time transcription of audio streams into text. Your applications, tools, or devices can consume, display, and take action on this text as command input.
